name: Repressed Memories
description:
Attention: this game contain some content that may be too heavy for some people.

Daniel and Elysa were a young couple, but one fatal incident destroyed their happy life together. Now Daniel has to struggle to move on with his life while fighting his inner monsters and trying to recover his own mental sanity!

Travel through Daniel's memories to discover what happened with his relationship and make decisions that will help him to move on. Can Daniel win this fight against himself or will he face a bad ending?

Devs:

Sikork(@krokistheman)

Coffeebat(@Medinuwu)

Also thanks to SuperJet Spade for the help with the music!
